title: Evolution, Beyond Technology
description: The pandemic has accelerated many changes, but some of the most vital go beyond technology, says Colony Group Chairman Michael Nathanson.
itunes:author: Barron's Advisor
itunes:summary: The pandemic has accelerated many changes, but some of the most vital go beyond technology, says Colony Group Chairman Michael Nathanson.
